title: What are you afraid of?
body:
Im scared of the ocean, more specifically what is _in_ the ocean. If you really boil it down though what im absolutely terrified of is large sea creatures.

I love the ocean though, its so vast and filled with crazy creatures and real life monsters (i love monsters)

But its the large ones that make me shiver, that make me afraid to go into water.

Ever since i can remember ive always been afraid that one day ill be swimming in the water and ill just be chilling beneath the surface and ill turn around and see this giant gaping maw headed straight for me.

http://ai-i2.infcdn.net/icons_siandroid/png/300/3361/3361867.png
